fn.p: Edited by Jeremy Nathans, Johns Hopkins University School of Medicine, Baltimore, MD, and approved March 10, 2020 (received for review February 11, 2020)
Author contributions: Y.L. designed research; H.C. and Y.C. performed research; Y.L. contributed new reagents/analytic tools; H.C. and Y.L. analyzed data; and H.C., S.J.R., and Y.L. wrote the paper.
